page.title: 13OCKBROOK PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: The Council under the chairmanship of{ {Mr.D.Hodges}normally meet monthly in the Ockbrook Village Hall.Included in the great variety of matters arising over the past five months have been repairs to the village hall,the siting of street lighting,approval for a football match to raise funds for the{ {Bradford City Fire Appeal}and complaints about frisky bullocks on a public footpath.Ongoing matters have included approval and support for the forthcoming{Carnival,}unauthorised development of a builder's yard,fouling of footways and grass verges by dogs and the{Village Quiz which was eventually won by Ockbrook School Staff.A source of constant attention is the{Ock Brook}which caused major flooding and a death by drowning a few years ago,the most recent work has involved {desilting.
